segments.text: Could I meet with you to discuss the project ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Good idea . We could meet on Monday or Tuesday . Which day would you prefer ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Tuesday would be good for me .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: OK . Do you think we should meet in the morning or in the afternoon ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I think the afternoon would be best .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That will work out . I will e-mail the exact time tomorrow . I need you to bring your plans with you .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , I will bring my plans with me to the meeting .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Should we invite the whole committee or should we just have the sub-committee there ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I feel that the whole committee needs to be there .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , I agree . We'll make sure that they get notified . Can you find the meeting place ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , I know how to get there on my own .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Great ! We will send you all the details later . Looking forward to meeting with you !
segments.speaker: S2
